Title: No Nigerian policeman should earn less than N500,000 monthly –Sowore
Summary: Human rights activist Omoyele Sowore has called for a radical overhaul of Nigeria’s policing system . He said no police officer in the country should earn less than N500,000 per month . The activist argued that improving Nigeria's policing system is needed .

Title: Education Ministry launches ‘EDU REVAMP’ to transform sector
Summary: The Federal Ministry of Education has launched the ‘EDU REVAMP’ Communities of Practice (CoPs), a strategic initiative aimed at transforming education delivery and professional collaboration in Nigerian schools . The launch ceremony was held at the Ministry’s headquarters in Abuja on Monday .

Title: Catholic bishop hails DSS, Army for rescuing priest, others in Borno, Zamfara
Summary: The Catholic Bishop of Maiduguri Diocese, Most Rev. John Bakeni, praised the Department of State Services (DSS) and the Nigerian Army for the successful rescue of Reverend Father Alphonsus Afina . The priest was abducted by Boko Haram insurgents in Borno .

Title: Rivers monarch, Ihunwo, praised for peace initiatives
Summary: The Paramount Ruler of Woji Community in Obio/Akpor Local Government Area of Rivers State, HRH Emeke Ihunwo, has been applauded for his commitment to ensuring peace in the area since he ascended to the throne .

Title: PDP announces three-day NEC meeting in Abuja
Summary: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has announced the schedule for its 101st National Executive Committee (NEC) meeting . PDP’s spokesperson, Debo Ologunagba, said the meeting will take place on Wednesday, July 23, Thursday, Friday .
